speakers.text: I mean, have you any questions on anything I've gone through so far?

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: No, no, it all sounds pretty, pretty straightforward.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Yeah, perfect. So we've got two options in terms of getting started. With us, we do a six week transformation program which is £199, or we do a monthly program which is £110amonth. Now if you go straight onto the monthly, it would be a minimum three Month commitment on that one. So of those two, which do you feel would be best for you at this stage?

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: I think probably monthly, to be honest. I mean six weeks is great, but I don't have anything I'm particularly aiming for in a six week period. This is more sort of a sustained lifestyle change rather than making a quick impact, if that makes sense.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Yeah, perfect. Lovely. And I suppose the million dollar question then is when would you like to start.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Really? I suppose I can. I'm just trying to think. I'm away through two weeks in July so it'd probably be the sort of third, fourth week of July, something like that.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Okay. Is that purely because you've got those couple of weeks off?

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Yeah, just because I'm away on holiday, to be honest.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Okay, cool. So here is what I am going to say to you and what I would recommend that you do instead. I would say to you, start earlier. So as in next week, if you're away for two weeks, I can just do the first month, a half price for you so you're not sort of wasting sort of money and time. The problem you get is if you wait a month effectively, then when you're away for those two weeks you are likely to slightly overindulge, knowing you've got this program starting. So you'd be like, almost like it's future Tom's problem. He can deal with it at that stage. Whereas if you, if you start now, that holiday is going to happen either way. But you know, you can at least get going, get started while you're away. You probably have a mindset of more like damage limitations. Even if it's 10% less than you would normally do by the time you come back on the holiday, you're in a better place from there. Like I'm happy to be flexible on, on that first month if you're away, that's fine. And does that all make sense?

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Yeah, absolutely. Yeah, it makes sense. In terms of your see we're talking 3sess a week is a minimum when, what are, what days do you do, what are the times, etc.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: So we do every day. So we do Monday to Saturday most weeks. We also do a Sunday, but it's not every week, so I don't officially put it on the timetable. So and we do 6am, 7am, we then do 5pm, 6pm and 7pm and on a Monday and Friday we have a lunchtime at 1:30.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Okay, so was it 6pm to 7pm did you say there as well?

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Yes. So yes, on an evening There are. So there's three sessions on an evening, five till six, six till seven and seven till eight.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Okay. Okay, cool. And in terms of those, so say if I joined up on a, on a monthly basis, do I have to tell you ahead of time which session I'm coming to or is it just a turn up? And.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: So you do. Yeah, you need to, you need to book in. And it's very flexible though. So let's say you wanted to do a 7pm you can book in at 6:59. So it is incredibly flexible. You don't have to do the same time and days each week, so that can change. And even once you booked in, if you need to cancel and book another one, you absolutely can do. So again, let's say you booked in for 6 o' clock and then something came up at work and you had to book in for the seven, then you absolutely can do. So we provide as much flexibility as possible.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Yeah, that's fine. And in terms of the. What does a normal session, I know they'll all be varied, but what does this, what sort of does it entail?

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Generally, we use two schools of training. One is your typical strength and conditioning work. So that is your usual, you know, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells. It's your squats, your bench presses, like, it's like we use, we utilize quite a lot of that stuff for the strength side. The cardio side with us is what's called functional cardio. So that's tire flips, it's battle ropes, it's boxing, it's sled pushes, it's TRXs, it's that style that we use for the cardio side. So we use a combination of those two schools of training.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Cool. Okay, sounds good. Yeah, I don't think I've got any of the questions, particularly, to be honest.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Lovely. So we just need to take a few details from you to get you onto the system, then talk through the next stages in terms of getting you booked in for your first session and everything. So can I just confirm your email address, please?

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Yeah, it's tom.shooksmithmail.com.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: I'm assuming Shooksmith is your surname.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: It is, that's right.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Lovely. And then final thing will be to just add some payment details onto the system. So nothing will be billed until next time Monday, when your first day will be. And like I said, it'll be £55. I'll do it for half price for your first month as you're going to be.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Let me just look at my work Calendar for that turn around that quickly. One second. Because it just say I'm generally away one or two nights a week, but let me just see where we're at. So that's week commencing the 30th, isn't it? So I. I'm actually away three nights next week. Monday, Tuesday and Monday. Sorry, Monday, Tuesday and Thursday. So next week is probably not the best. Yeah, but then I'm away from the 8th. I'd actually. I get the. Your point reference, the holiday piece for sure. But I would actually probably be better at looking to start week commencing the 21st in reality because I'm just not.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Going to be here, honestly, like with what you just said there then that if you're not here next week and then it's going to be struggle for. Honestly, absolutely fine.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Yeah.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: But, yeah, so I'll put that there. Yeah, it'll mean. So I'll set it for the 21st and that's when your first payment will come out. That will be the full amount then for the 110 on the 21st. Just to confirm that one could be obviously after your holiday. Is that okay with yourself?

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Yeah. Okay. So that will just roll over to 21st of each month, will it?

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah. Oh, yeah, it's just. Yeah, it's done on the anniversary of. Yeah, lovely. So then it'll just be to take some payment details onto the system. So do you have a card you want to use for that?

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Yeah, not on me, but.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Okay.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Whereabouts are you on Clifton Moor, by the way?

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: So we are sort of. Do you know where the car garages are? Yeah, so we're sort of just around the corner from there. So if you go like between where Pure Gym is and the car garage is, we're kind of halfway between the two. We're on Ulster Road. Depends how well you know it.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Yeah, it rings a bell.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Yeah. Like we're opposite, opposite Wicks Subways, just around the corner from us. It's if, you know, if you get to Clifton Moor, it's very easy to get to.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Yeah, no worries. Okay, what do you need from me?

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Just the long number across the front of the card. Whenever you're ready.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Okay. Yeah. 4462.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Yeah.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Yep.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Yep.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Lovely. And the expiry, please?

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: 1027 and then three across the back is 248.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Perfect. And what's your postcode please?

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Yep.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: One JT.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Lovely. There we go. So I'll get that put through for you now, like I said, nothing will be billed until you want. You start next month from here. The next steps are going to be you'll have automated emails that comes through to give you access to the booking system, so you best go and get yourself booked in from the 21st onwards. And I'm going to pass your details over to Matt, who's our manager over there, and he'll be the one working with you, so he'll reach out to you at some point later today just to welcome himself. I'll update him on everything so he knows that you're not starting until the 21st, but, yeah, he'll be your key support network as you go through it from them. Have you got any final questions while you have me right now?

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: No, I don't think so. Not on the face of it, no. All seems good.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Perfect. Lovely. Well, it's a huge welcome from us, Tom. It's been lovely chatting to you and we'll see you after your holiday. Enjoy.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Nice one. Thanks very much.

speakers.speaker: B
speakers.text: Take care, Tom.

speakers.speaker: A
speakers.text: Cheers.

chapters.summary: Hi, Sam. How are you? I've got a few minutes between meetings. Wonderful, lovely. Gives you a nice little break if nothing else then absolutely always welcome.
chapters.headline: Hi, Sam. How we doing? Yeah, not so bad

chapters.summary: So really Tom, all I want to do is just better understand your goals to begin with. Get a good feel for where you're at, what you want to achieve. A little bit deeper and then I'll go through who we are, what we do. If that works for you.
chapters.headline: So really Tom, all I want to do is better understand your goals

chapters.summary: "I play competitive racket sports, always have done. I haven't done anything consistently in the gym for a lot of years. Also we just found out that we're going to be expecting a baby early in the new year so just want to be a bit fitter "
chapters.headline: What is it ultimately that you are looking to achieve with your weight loss efforts

chapters.summary: So yeah, it sounds like you've gone through the typical journey fit in your 20s. Then work, family, social life usually sort of creep up and take over. Being in the best shape physically, mentally and general, well being for when that happens is going to put you in good stead.
chapters.headline: Being in the best shape when expecting a baby is hugely important

chapters.summary: So what is the main struggle with just doing this yourself? Like why not say just go join pure gym, you go and train under your own steam. Why look at something like us where you get that sort of additional help and support?
chapters.headline: So what is the main struggle with just doing this yourself? Like why not join pure gym

chapters.summary: We specialize in helping guys over 40 to lose weight, get fit and to improve their health. Three areas that all work together: training, nutrition and accountability. Having support network is so important with progress.
chapters.headline: We specialize in helping guys over 40 to lose weight, get fit and improve health

chapters.summary: With us, we do a six week transformation program which is £199, or a monthly program for £110amonth. Of those two, which do you feel would be best for you at this stage? I think probably monthly, to be honest.
chapters.headline: With us, we do a six week transformation program which is £199

chapters.summary: Start earlier. If you wait a month effectively, then when you're away for those two weeks you are likely to slightly overindulge, knowing you've got this program starting. Whereas if you start now, that holiday is going to happen either way.
chapters.headline: When would you like to start. I'm away through two weeks in July

chapters.summary: Tom Shooksmith is the founder of functional cardio training. The company uses two schools of training: strength and conditioning and functional cardio. The first payment will be £55 for the first month. The service is very flexible and can be booked ahead of time.
chapters.headline: Tom Shooksmith offers flexible and flexible fitness training for under £55

chapters.summary: You start next month from here. Nothing will be billed until you want. The next steps are going to be you'll have automated emails that comes through to give you access to the booking system. You best go and get yourself booked in from the 21st onwards.
chapters.headline: Tom, you start next month from here. The next steps are going to be
